alert.note: Alert for Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 07 at 1:46PM MST until January 08 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches in high elevations of the Park. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 0 to 10 below zero. * WHERE...Zion National Park. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
